aboutMe.para: My name is Yonela Mangele and I am currently 20 years old. I am an aspiring fullstack web developer and it is all because of my unwavering dedication and love for coding. Ever since I started coding in high school, I have always challenged myself with requiring more assignments from my lecturer so that I could hone my coding skills and also learn how to handle multiple tasks at once on a daily basis, which is a skillset I am currently mastering. When I have a group project, I enjoy leading the group because I have a creative approach to solving a problem. My sense of humour also helps to lighten the mood of my group members and when they are in a fun space to work in, they become motivated to meet the deadlines of projects we work on because as much as I tease around to create a healthy environment, I take my work seriously.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a functional calculator.

projects.name: E-commerce
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a system that will allow customers to buy or view products and be able to make use of a checkout page. In addition, a user must log in before purchasing an item or a product(s)

projects.name: BMI-Calculator
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a functional BMI-Calculator.

projects.name: Temperature-Converter
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a functional temperature-converter.

projects.name: Minutes To Seconds
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a functional converter that converts minutes to seconds.

projects.name: Keyboard
projects.description: In this project, I was required to create a non-functional keyboard.

resume.description: I am currently doing a 12-month coding course at Life Choices Coding Academy and learning various coding languages
I did coding from Gr10 until Gr12 at COSAT, which is a secondary school in Khayelitsha, Cape Town. I only learned mostly HTML because it was the only coding language that was provided.
